effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.
Set: Earth Shock damage increased by 25%. Earthquake damage increased by 25%.
(4) Set: Spending Maelstrom grants you 5% increased critical strike chance and 10% increased critical damage dealt for 5 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Take what is rightfully yours, gorging on your target's essence to deal 3.4 million Shadow damage and healing you for 508,626 over 2 sec. Damage and healing increased based on the target's missing health.

Cooldown reduced by 60 sec if this effect kills the target. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
